Articles.Content:
Hey guys, 

so, I'm building a small-medium sized cruiser,  and I'm trying to put 2 small fighters inside it. I've used hyperedit to get them both to orbit, and have tried to dock manually. once im close, I move towards the docking port slowly (<1 M/s), but on impact the fighter recoils and causes the cruser to wobble forever, which stops physics warp, as it says "Cannot use physics warp under acceleration" or the like. 

My mods are:

Atmosphere Autopilot, BD animation, Telemachus, Anyres, Com. Navball docking alignment, Com. Resource pack, Correct COL, firespitter core, ForScience! FTL drive, Hyperedit, KAS, Kerbal Space Ponies, Infernal robotics, MJ2 + MJ+engineer for all, Module manager, Otter submersible, Rasterprop, Smokescreen, Texture replacer, USI Exploration and Tools.

Reproduction:

Pretty much any docking will cause one or both crafts to wobble
